channel.title: Adin|Modoc County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Adin|Modoc County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CA-299 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-299 west. Distance to Bieber, Burney, and Redding.

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West at CA-139/CA-299 Split
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West at CA-139/CA-299 Split. Turn left for CA-139 South to Eagle Lake, Susanville, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West Approaching CA-139/CA-299 Split
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West Approaching CA-139/CA-299 split. Turn left for CA-139 south to Eagle Lake, Susanville, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West - Lookout Jct.
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West at Lookout Jct. Merge left to continue west on CA-299 (and south on CA-139).

item.title: CA-139 North at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 north at CA-299 west to Redding, and east to Alturas.

item.title: CA-139 North at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 north at CA-299. CA-139 north follows CA-299 east to Canby.

item.title: CA-139 North at CA-299 in Aden
item.description: CA-139 north approaching CA-299. Klamath Falls, 101 miles, on CA-139 North/CA-299 East.
